title: BugSplat
body: Seems like i can play League without any issues, but when i try to re-watch my replays with BaronReplay or just to find some interesting highlight, i get a bug splat and no matter what i do its the same. #WutFace

replies.body: I'm not having any issue watching replays through BaronReplays. You might want to try reinstalling BaronReplays and/or performing a client repair. Also make sure you're watching replays from the current patch version; you are unable to watch replays from a prior patch unless you have a copy of that client version somewhere and direct BaronReplays to use it.

> [{quoted}](name=Deep Terror Nami,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=PMkxt5sN,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-07-28T13:39:12.601+0000)
>
> I'm not having any issue watching replays through BaronReplays. You might want to try reinstalling BaronReplays and/or performing a client repair. Also make sure you're watching replays from the current patch version; you are unable to watch replays from a prior patch unless you have a copy of that client version somewhere and direct BaronReplays to use it.

I know how BaronReplaz works, and i never had a issue of watching previous matches from previous patches, because i simply don't update BaronReplay itself. So until i update it, i can always watch previous matches. This started happening 2 days ago, when Riot issued that there was a problem with bugsplats, so i guess i gotta do now a full repair.

Deep Terror Nami has provided some good insight here. If updating the program and running a repair  causes no change, your best bet is to reach out to the program's developer or a subreddit dedicated to the program (if one exists). Since Riot doesn't develop the program you're using to watch replays, we're not able to support it.

Let me know if you have any questions.
